regarding letter grades at current institution              PICK YOUR PROGRAM            Bachelor of Science  Master of Science for non-RNs  Master of Science for RNs  Doctor of Nursing Practice  Doctor of Philosophy  Certificate Programs      The Nurse Generalist  A BSN degree from UIC will provide you with the strongest possible foundation for a fulfilling career as a nurse      BSN programs           The traditional program  The on-campus BSN program is the classic college experience             The completion program  Our fully online RN to BSN program is perfect for working nurses taking the next step            The Career Changer  For people with a bachelor’s degree in a non-nursing ﬁeld who wish to join the growing and gratifying field of nursing      Grad-entry MS           About the program  Ranked #16 in the nation, our MS program is among the best in the Midwest             Unbeatable support  Our Clinical Learning Resource Center has everything you need to succeed            The Clinical Leader  Graduates enrich their clinical skills and develop leadership skills, preparing for elevated roles as care coordinators      Tiles           About the program  Ranked #16 in the nation, our MS program is among the best in the Midwest             RN without a bachelor's in nursing? No problem.  Our AGMS Transition Program is for RNs with non-nursing bachelor's degrees            The Expert Clinician  DNP students graduate with an exceptional blend of clinical, organizational, financial and leadership skills      Tiles           About the program  Get all details about the nation's #6 ranked DNP program             Choose one of our 12 focus areas  Preparing APRNs and healthcare leaders            The Nurse Researcher  Our program emphasizes strong mentoring relationships between students and advisors from our world-class faculty      Tiles           About the program  Join a research community with four Hall of Fame researchers and 29 AAN fellows             Researchers work in every aspect of health  Find faculty in your area of research interest            The Lifelong Learner  When a full degree isn't what you're seeking, certificate programs offer an increased level of specialized skill      Tiles           About our certificates  Four programs focus on palliative care, sleep health, school nursing, and teaching             The Post-DNP certificate  A unique path for DNP-prepared APRNs to add or change focus areas                     One college, six campuses  The UIC College of Nursing boasts six campuses in Northern and Central Illinois. There's probably one near you.
